function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and filtration standards in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID19 transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing and adhering to ventilation and filtration standards","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants, especially in learning environments and workplaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, ASHRAE"}]}
